contentList.content: Combat Extender
Blah blah blah, configuration explanation.
! Class: Flaming Fist Melee Attacker
! Class: Flaming Fist Melee Defender
! Class: Flaming Fist Ranger
! Class: Flaming Fist Cleric
! Class: Flaming Fist Caster
! CX Boost: Boss
A being of large import They gain boss boosts from configuration.
! CX Boost: Mini-Bosst
A being of some import. They gain mini-boss boosts from configuration.
! CX Boost: Martial
A character with experience in martial combat. They gain <LSTag Tooltip="Proficiency">Proficient</LSTag> with Martial Weapons, in addition to boosts from configuration.
! CX Boost: Magic
A character with experience in spellcasting. They gain a 30% increase to their spell's range, in addition to boosts from configuration.
! Class: Barbarian
A character who harnesses their fury to punish foes. They possess Barbarian progressions, and gain the <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="CX_Barbarian_Boost">! CX Boost: Barbarian</LSTag> passive.
! CX Boost: Barbarian
A character who harnesses their fury to punish foes. They gain Barbarian progressions in addition to boosts from configuration.
! Subclass: Berserker Barbarian

A Barbarian who follows a path of untrammelled fury and thrills in the chaos of battle, regardless of their own well-being. They gain Berserker Barbarian progressions in addition to boosts from configuration.
! Subclass: Wild Magic Barbarian
A Barbarian suffused with the wild influence of arcane power waiting to be released. They gain Wild Magic Barbarian progressions in addition to boosts from configuration.
! Subclass: Wildheart Barbarian
A Barbarian sharing a supernatural bond with nature, channeling the power of beasts. They gain Wildheart Barbarian progressions in addition to boosts from configuration.
! Class: Bard

A character with a versatile skillset, who blends artistry, trickery, and spellcraft. They possess Bard progressions, and gain the <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="CX_Bard_Boost">! CX Boost: Bard</LSTag> passive.
! CX Boost: Bard
A character with a versatile skillset, who blends artistry, trickery, and spellcraft. They gain Bard progressions in addition to boosts from configuration.
! Subclass: College of Lore Bard
A Bard who blends magic, wit, and scholarship into a versatile and unpredictable force. They gain College of Lore Bard progressions in addition to boosts from configuration.
! Subclass: College of Swords Bard
A Bard who turns combat into performance, striking with style, speed, and precision. They gain College of Swords Bard progressions in addition to boosts from configuration.
! Subclass: College of Valor Bard
A Bard who inspires bravery and leads with blade and song in the heart of battle. They gain College of Valor Bard progressions in addition to boosts from configuration.
! Class: Cleric
A character of faith, channeling divine magic both to aid and harm. They possess Cleric progressions, and gain the <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="CX_Cleric_Boost">! CX Boost: Cleric</LSTag> passive.
! CX Boost: Cleric
A character of faith, channeling divine magic both to aid and harm. They gain Cleric progressions in addition to boosts from configuration.
! Subclass: Life Domain Cleric
A Cleric who nurtures and protects, channeling radiant energy to heal and uplift. They gain Life Domain Cleric progressions in addition to boosts from configuration.
! Subclass: Light Domain Cleric
A Cleric who channels searing light to purify, protect, and punish. They gain Light Domain Cleric progressions in addition to boosts from configuration.
! Subclass: Knowledge Domain Cleric
A Cleric who seeks the wisdom of the gods, using knowledge to enlighten and defend. They gain Knowledge Domain Cleric progressions in addition to boosts from configuration.
! Subclass: Nature Domain Cleric
A Cleric who serves both deity and wilderness, blending divine magic with the rhythms of nature. They gain Nature Domain Cleric progressions in addition to boosts from configuration.
! Subclass: Tempest Domain Cleric
A Cleric who strikes with tempestuous might, standing at the eye of divine chaos. They gain Tempest Domain Cleric progressions in addition to boosts from configuration.
! Subclass: Trickery Domain Cleric
A Cleric who bends perception and fate, hiding divine purpose behind clever lies. They gain Trickery Domain Cleric progressions in addition to boosts from configuration.
! Subclass: War Domain Cleric
A Cleric who thrives in battle, calling upon divine might to strike hard and stand firm. They gain War Domain Cleric progressions in addition to boosts from configuration.
! Class: Druid

A character who commands the forces of nature, shaping the world with primal magic. They possess Druid progressions, and gain the <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="CX_Druid_Boost">! CX Boost: Druid</LSTag> passive.
! CX Boost: Druid Boost
A character who commands the forces of nature, shaping the world with primal magic. They gain Druid progressions in addition to boosts from configuration.
! Subclass: Circle of the Land Druid
A Druid who draws deep power from the land itself, shaped by the terrain they call home. They gain Circle of the Land Druid progressions in addition to boosts from configuration.
! Subclass: Circle of the Moon Druid
A Druid who specializes in Wild Shaping into massive beasts or even primal elementals. They gain Circle of the Moon Druid progressions in addition to boosts from configuration.
! Subclass: Circle of the Spores Druid
A Druid who uses fungal growth and decay to augment themselves and harm their foes. They gain Circle of the Spores Druid progressions in addition to boosts from configuration.
! Class: Fighter

A character who has mastered weapons and tactics, excelling in martial combat. They possess Fighter progressions, and gain the <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="CX_Fighter_Boost">! CX Boost: Fighter</LSTag> passive.
! CX Boost: Fighter
A character who has mastered weapons and tactics, excelling in martial combat. They gain Fighter progressions in addition to boosts from configuration.
! Subclass: Battle Master Fighter
A paragon of tactical superiority, who can employ a wide array of combat manoeuvres to dominate every fight. They gain Battle Master Fighter progressions in addition to boosts from configuration.
! Subclass: Eldritch Knight Fighter
A warrior of spell and sword who weaves incantations to supplement their martial expertise. They gain Eldritch Knight Fighter progressions in addition to boosts from configuration.
! Subclass: Champion Fighter
A Fighter who perfects the fundamentals of combat, turning every strike into a display of raw mastery. They gain Champion Fighter progressions in addition to boosts from configuration.
! Class: Monk

A character who disciplines body and spirit, moving with speed, precision, and inner focus. They possess Monk progressions, and gain the <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="CX_Monk_Boost">! CX Boost: Monk</LSTag> passive.
! CX Boost: Monk
A character who disciplines body and spirit, moving with speed, precision, and inner focus. They gain Monk progressions in addition to boosts from configuration.
! Subclass: Way of the Four Elements Monk
A Monk who uses their ki to bend the elements to their will. They gain Way of the Four Elements Monk progressions in addition to boosts from configuration.
! Subclass: Way of the Open Hand Monk
A Monk who refines each strike into a disciplined force, overwhelming foes with precision. They gain Way of the Open Hand Monk progressions in addition to boosts from configuration.
! Subclass: Way of Shadow Monk
A Monk who weaves through darkness, mastering stealth, illusion, and swift, unseen strikes. They gain Way of Shadow Monk progressions in addition to boosts from configuration.
! Class: Paladin

A character who upholds or neglects a sacred oath, a warrior of divinity or demise. They possess Monk progressions, and gain the <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="CX_Paladin_Boost">! CX Boost: Paladin</LSTag> passive.
! CX Boost: Paladin
A character who upholds or neglects a sacred oath, a warrior of divinity or demise. They gain Paladin progressions in addition to boosts from configuration.
! Class: Oath of the Ancients Paladin
A Paladin who defends the light of life and beauty, standing against despair and decay. They gain Oath of the Ancients Paladin progressions in addition to boosts from configuration.
! Subclass: Oath of Devotion Paladin
A Paladin who acts with honour and virtue to protect the weak and pursue the greater good. They gain Oath of Devotion Paladin progressions in addition to boosts from configuration.
! Subclass: Oath of Vengeance Paladin
A Paladin who set aside their own purity to right wrongs and deliver justice by any means necessary. They gain Oath of Vengeance Paladin progressions in addition to boosts from configuration.
! Subclass: Oathbreaker Paladin
A Paladin who broke their Oath in pursuit of power and ambition. They gain Oathbreaker Paladin progressions in addition to boosts from configuration.
! Class: Ranger

A character who thrives in the wilds, blending survival instinct with deadly precision. They possess Ranger progressions, and gain the <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="CX_Ranger_Boost">! CX Boost: Ranger</LSTag> passive.
! CX Boost: Ranger
A character who blends martial prowess with nature's magic. They gain Ranger progressions in addition to boosts from configuration.
! Subclass: Beast Master Ranger
A Ranger who can summon an animal companion to aid them in combat. They gain Beast Master Ranger progressions in addition to boosts from configuration.
! Subclass: Gloom Stalker Ranger
A Ranger who thrives in the shadows, striking first and unseen in the darkest places. They gain Gloom Stalker Ranger progressions in addition to boosts from configuration.
! Subclass: Hunter Ranger
A Ranger who excels at slaying the most dangerous prey. They gain Hunter Ranger progressions in addition to boosts from configuration.
! Class: Rogue
A character who excels in stealth, strategy, and quick thinking. They possess Rogue progressions, and gain the <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="CX_Rogue_Boost">! CX Boost: Rogue</LSTag> passive.
! CX Boost: Rogue
A character who excels in stealth, strategy, and quick thinking. They gain Rogue progressions in addition to boosts from configuration.
! Subclass: Arcane Trickster Rogue
A Rogue who weaves magic into their mischief, bending reality to enhance their cunning. They gain Arcane Trickster Rogue progressions in addition to boosts from configuration.
! Subclass: Assassin Rogue
A Rogue who blends disguise, poison, and precision to eliminate targets before they're aware. They gain Assassin Rogue progressions in addition to boosts from configuration.
! Subclass: Thief Rogue
A Rogue who turns nimbleness and nerve into an unmatched edge in any situation. They gain Thief Rogue progressions in addition to boosts from configuration.
! Class: Sorcerer

A character with raw arcane power, shaping magic through will alone. They possess Sorcerer progressions, and gain the <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="CX_Sorcerer_Boost">! CX Boost: Sorcerer</LSTag> passive.
! CX Boost: Sorcerer
A character with raw arcane power, shaping magic through will alone. They gain Sorcerer progressions in addition to boosts from configuration.
! Subclass: Draconic Bloodline Sorcerer
A Sorcerer whose blood carries the legacy of dragons, manifesting in powerful and resilient magic. They gain Draconic Bloodline Sorcerer progressions in addition to boosts from configuration.
! Subclass: Wild Magic Sorcerer
A Sorcerer whose spells sometimes twist reality in strange and unexpected ways. They gain Wild Magic Sorcerer progressions in addition to boosts from configuration.
! Subclass: Storm Sorcery Sorcerer
A Sorcerer whose presence crackles with thunder and fury, a living conduit of the storm's wrath. They gain Storm Sorcery Sorcerer progressions in addition to boosts from configuration.
! Class: Warlock

A character who wields eldritch magic granted by a supernatural patron. They possess Warlock progressions, and gain the <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="CX_Warlock_Boost">! CX Boost: Warlock</LSTag> passive.
! CX Boost: Warlock
A character who wields eldritch magic granted by a supernatural patron. They gain Warlock progressions in addition to boosts from configuration.
! Subclass: The Archfey Warlock
A Warlock who serves a capricious fey patron, mastering charm, illusion, and misdirection. They gain The Archfey Warlock progressions in addition to boosts from configuration.
! Subclass: The Fiend Warlock
A Warlock who bargains with fiends to unleash devastating power. They gain The Fiend Warlock progressions in addition to boosts from configuration.
! Subclass: The Great Old One Warlock
A Warlock who touches the mind of an unknowable entity, speaking secrets not meant for mortals. They gain The Great Old One Warlock progressions in addition to boosts from configuration.
! Class: Wizard
A character who masters the weave through study and intellect. They possess Wizard progressions, and gain the <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="CX_Wizard_Boost">! CX Boost: Wizard</LSTag> passive.
! CX Boost: Wizard
A character who masters the weave through study and intellect. They gain Wizard progressions in addition to boosts from configuration.
! Subclass: Abjuration School Wizard
A Wizard who masters wards and barriers, standing firm against magical and mundane threats. They gain Abjuration School Wizard progressions in addition to boosts from configuration.
! Subclass: Conjuration School Wizard
A Wizard who summons creatures and objects from thin air, commanding forces from across the planes. They gain Conjuration School Wizard progressions in addition to boosts from configuration.
! Subclass: Divination School Wizard
A Wizard who peers into the future, bending fate through insight and foresight. They gain Divination School Wizard progressions in addition to boosts from configuration.
! Subclass: Enchantment School Wizard
A Wizard who twists minds and emotions, weaving spells of charm, command, and domination. They gain Enchantment School Wizard progressions in addition to boosts from configuration.
! Subclass: Evocation School Wizard
A Wizard who unleashes pure destructive magic. They gain Evocation School subclass boosts from configuration. They gain Evocation School Wizard progressions in addition to boosts from configuration.
! Subclass: Illusion School Wizard
A Wizard who manipulates perception, crafting shadows and phantoms to deceive and disorient. They gain Illusion School Wizard progressions in addition to boosts from configuration.
! Subclass: Necromancy School Wizard
A Wizard who bends mortality itself, wielding death as both a weapon and a shield.They gain Necromancy School Wizard progressions in addition to boosts from configuration.
! Subclass: Transmutation School Wizard
A Wizard who alters the fabric of existence, changing what is into what could be. They gain Transmutation School Wizard progressions in addition to boosts from configuration.
! CX Boost: Level 1 Spells
A character with experience in spellcasting. They gain access to spellslots, and a variety of spells from configuration.
! CX Boost: Level 2 Spells
A character with experience in spellcasting. They gain access to spellslots, and a variety of spells from configuration.
! CX Boost: Level 3 Spells
A character with experience in spellcasting. They gain access to spellslots, and a variety of spells from configuration.
! CX Boost: Level 4 Spells
A character with experience in spellcasting. They gain access to spellslots, and a variety of spells from configuration.
! CX Boost: Level 5 Spells
A character with experience in spellcasting. They gain access to spellslots, and a variety of spells from configuration.
! CX Boost: Level 6 Spells
A character with experience in spellcasting. They gain access to spellslots, and a variety of spells from configuration.
! CX Boost: Level 1 Spells - Control
They gain access to spells from configuration.
! CX Boost: Level 2 Spells - Control
They gain access to spells from configuration.
! CX Boost: Level 3 Spells - Control
They gain access to spells from configuration.
! CX Boost: Level 4 Spells - Control
They gain access to spells from configuration.
! CX Boost: Level 5 Spells - Control
They gain access to spells from configuration.
! CX Boost: Level 6 Spells - Control
They gain access to spells from configuration.

Blessed with the favour of a goddess, Nightsong cannot be permanently killed. When unconscious, Nightsong can regain 1 <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">hit point</LSTag> if she succeeds a <LSTag Tooltip="Constitution">Constitution</LSTag> <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag> at the beginning of her turn.
